website_summaries.verdict: Inspired by leather-bound Classics line, the Puma Breaker Leather resurrects the vintage look of coveted low tops like the Suede , Smash, and Basket and improves every inch of those styles in bountiful flair.Comfort was also not disregarded as it still delivers a pleasurable ride along with the edgy detailing in a low profile form. Continuously astonishing customers with its out-of-the-look utility, the sneaker was observed to contain a cozy amount of room without sacrificing fit.
pros: A lot of users achieved a perfect fit with the Puma Breaker Leather
One customer specifically mentioned the sleek look of the bumpers
A couple of buyers were astounded that the sneaker was assembled in a very durable construction
The Puma Breaker Leather is evidence that the Puma Classics line continues to improve through time as stated by a user
A couple of purchasers loved the use of leather on its uppers
Many reviewers applauded the comfort that the sneaker delivered
It was a cool-looking shoe, according to a lot of buyers, and its style works perfectly for them too
Two wearers found the sneaker to have an ample amount of room in the toe area unlike other iterations from Puma that they bought
Less than a handful of buyers commended the sneaker’s excellent price
cons: One commenter disliked the sneaker’s flat form which lacks arch support
A couple of wearers were a bit appalled about the low top sneaker’s weight which is a tad heavy

customer_reviews.title: to me there is nothing better than Pumas
customer_reviews.text: to me there is nothing better than Pumas. I have been using them since high school and I'm my 40s now. But, I don't use the racing or athletic kind. I like this classic models. I wish they would continue improving on them like they did with this one.
customer_reviews.author: 0v3rkill

customer_reviews.title: Better than Air Force 1
customer_reviews.text: This is a real review. I have worn Nike Air Force 1 for 30 years. I wear 11.5 men's US. These Pumas fit the same as the Nikes. 3 days into wearing the Pumas and I never experienced any break in discomfort. Think I found a new shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.Griff

customer_reviews.title: Snow tires
customer_reviews.text: Good looking shoe. Wider than other Pumas I've purchased. The fit is more modern than Puma Suede and Basket. If the Puma Suede is a good weather shoe then these are bad weather shoes. I ordered a 10 and they fit like a 10. The souls are very thick and heavier than the suede and basket. There's a lot of rubber on the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: A. S.

customer_reviews.title: Best pair in the closet
customer_reviews.text: Nicest pair in the collection and already got several compliments. "Don't step on my Blue Suede Shoes!" LOL.....If you don't know the reference, Google it.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: comfort for the feet
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with all of my Puma sneakers. pros.= The fit and look Is always great. cons = I wear a 9 mens 10.5 womans for unisex sneakers and this size goes out FAST and I have to search the web to find them, and if I do in my size, THE PRICE IS OFTEN TRIPLED.
customer_reviews.author: Constance G. Simari

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! I'll be honest at first they looked a little wide and I was iffy about them but now I don't mind it it's like the style works perfectly for me. Roomy too not tight like others. I wear them all the time now!
customer_reviews.author: Steadfastgent

customer_reviews.title: Thanks who made this shoes
customer_reviews.text: I like this shoes very nice looking thanks who designed this shoes
customer_reviews.author: danny

customer_reviews.title: new style to old classic
customer_reviews.text: Fits like a glove. durable sole. soft leather...good for those puma lovers
customer_reviews.author: C. Rodiguez

customer_reviews.title: I really liked this pumas
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this pumas, the real deal, 100% original and fresh out of the box. Fit as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Ramon De Aza SDQ43487

customer_reviews.title: comfortable fashion sneaker
customer_reviews.text: comfortable fashion sneaker. more cushioned than earlier puma version, more than chuck taylors. sz 9.5 is spacious in the toe without being too big overall
customer_reviews.author: ces

customer_reviews.title: Look Great, soft leather.
customer_reviews.text: I like the soft leather and look of the shoe. I wish they offered a little more arch support.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: I like the shoe it feels good
customer_reviews.text: The shoe fits very well i love the way the shoe fits
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Well made shoe and worth the bucks
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is very well made. Comfortable and looks amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Unhappy customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a good result.
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised the product was not the right size
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: I like the looks of the shoes but the left foot is smaller than the right foot and is painful to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Mathieu

customer_reviews.title: Great stylish gym shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Simply amazing shoes! So comfortable and the fit is true to size! You could wear these all day and wouldn’t even know. Definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Zachary D. Finn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just plain old bad a** old school sneakers with nice updates. Excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph C.

customer_reviews.title: Great sneaker
customer_reviews.text: The color is unique and goes well with jeans. Great fit and comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Myers

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Love the retro style. Does have a bit of an arch which is like.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommend a size up...
customer_reviews.text: And a really tight fit, even if you normally wear a medium width shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Parker

customer_reviews.title: Feels good looks better.
customer_reviews.text: Never wore pumas before. Don’t know why because I love them
customer_reviews.author: Roland marris

product_meta.title: PUMA Men's Breaker Sneaker
product_meta.description: The PUMA breaker leather is taking design cues of PUMA old classics but with a slightly raised midsole. It features an all over leather upper to give a clean updated look to the PUMA classics.
